T02D3449:106a-1: aa ra pa tsa na s'a dha nam /
T02D3449:106a-3: aa ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3449:106a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3449:106a-5: ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar glegs bam ral gris phyag mtshan pa //
T02D3449:106a-6: mchog gi blo gros rab mdzes zhi ba'i gzhon nu zur phud lnga //
T02D3449:106a-7: thar mchog dga' ba rgya chen padma'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan yangs pa //
T02D3449:106b-0: blo gros ngan pa bsreg mkhas 'jam pa'i dbyangs @106b la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3449:106b-1: gang gis blo phyed rgyun mi 'chad par mngon bsgoms pas //
T02D3449:106b-2: skye bos aa ra pa tsa na ni nges bsgrub phyir //
T02D3449:106b-3: dngos po ma lus rtogs pa'i byang chub thob pa yi //
T02D3449:106b-4: rin chen 'khor lo'i man ngag shin tu bsdu bar bya //
T02D3449:106b-5: mnyam gtsang sngags pas yid du 'ong pa'i sa yi char //
T02D3449:106b-6: dri zhim me tog gcal bkram spos chus byugs gyur nas //
T02D3449:106b-7: gang zhig 'jam zhing yid 'ong stan la nyer gnas te //
T02D3449:106b-8: bde ba shin tu mtshan med byang chub sems bsgom bya //
T02D3449:106b-9: rang bzhin dag pa'i sngags ni yang dag brjod //
T02D3449:106b-10: kun nas ma lus stong par rab bsgoms te //
T02D3449:106b-11: gzhan don bcas pa bdag gi lus 'di yang //
T02D3449:106b-12: 'di ni 'od gsal mtha' ru lan cig bsam //
T02D3449:106b-13: de nas par snang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D3449:106b-14: dbyangs yig dang po 'od dang ldan pa bsgom //
T02D3449:106b-15: de nas 'dir ni shin tu dkar ba'i dh'i: //
T02D3449:106b-16: de las 'jam dbyangs dri ma med pa bsgom //
T02D3449:106b-17: ri bong gis mtshan bye ba'i 'od mtshungs la //
T02D3449:106b-18: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan gyur rab tu 'bar //
T02D3449:106b-19: bsam gtan mthar phyin chu skyes steng na bzhugs //
T02D3449:106b-20: chags bcas cung zad 'dzum zhing yid du 'ong //
T02D3449:106b-21: rang gi snying gar aa yig mchog ni rnam 'phro legs bltas la //
T02D3449:106b-22: mnyam med 'od zer dra ba dang ldan 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad gzugs //
T02D3449:106b-23: de yi steng du sngags pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgom //
T02D3449:106b-24: de yis ri bong 'dzin ltar 'jam dbyangs nyid dang de bzhin du //
T02D3449:106b-25: g-yas phyogs yid 'ong gzugs can 'dzum zhing zur gyis lta byed pa //
T02D3449:106b-26: nu ma zung dag rab rgyas skra ldan ma de lta byed pa //
T02D3449:106b-27: g-yon phyogs rab mdzes sgeg pa'i gzugs ldan nye ba'i skra can ma //
T02D3449:106b-28: yon tan ma lus gter gyur tsa na dag las bsgom par bya //
T02D3449:106b-29: mdun du nges dgod dra ba can gyi 'od //
T02D3449:106b-30: dri med rab dkar ra yig las byung nyid //
T02D3449:106b-31: pa yig las byung 'od zer rang bzhin can //
T02D3449:106b-32: yid 'ong zla 'od rgyab tu dgod par bya //
T02D3449:106b-33: yang na yi ge 'od zer rab 'bar ba'i //
T02D3449:106b-34: mthu ldan rgya chen rnam par bsgom bya ste //
T02D3449:106b-35: de rnams mi shes ri bong rab 'joms shing //
T02D3449:106b-36: ye shes dam pa rnyog pa med par mdzad //
T02D3449:106b-37: 'og tu 'khor lo myur du 'khor bsams nas //
T02D3449:106b-38: gti mug mun pa mtha' dag 'joms par mdzad //
T02D3449:106b-39: yi dam lha sku mi 'gyur nyid bltas nas //
T02D3449:106b-40: 'od zer dra chen zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin//
T02D3449:107a-0: @107a * // zla ltar 'od zer sprin tshogs rgya chen rnams //
T02D3449:107a-1: nges 'thon phyogs bcu rnams su 'phro bar blta //
T02D3449:107a-2: bdag lus de bzhin sems can rnams brgyan te //
T02D3449:107a-3: mtha' nas slar 'ongs zla ba la zhugs te //
T02D3449:107a-4: mchog gi sngags pas blo gros brtan zhing man ngag ji bzhin du //
T02D3449:107a-5: aa ra pa tsa na mchog sngags bzlas bsgom la 'bad byas na //
T02D3449:107a-6: myur du sa mchog rnams dang dri med yid 'ong phar phyin rnams //
T02D3449:107a-7: blo gros ngan pa'i nyes pa kun bcom rgyal rnams thob par 'gyur //
T02D3449:107a-8: bla ma dam pa dga' rab rdo rje dam chos mdzod gyur pas //
T02D3449:107a-9: bde gshegs tshogs kyi spyan sngar gang rnams cho gas dbang bskur ba'i//
T02D3449:107a-10: blo gros bzang po mi pham bshes gnyen skye bo'i blo gros rnams //
T02D3449:107a-11: bsgrub phyir aa ra pa tsa na mchog 'khor lo gzhung bzhin sbyar //
T02D3449:107a-12: 'khor lo'i cho ga'i mchog ni legs sbyar ba'i //
T02D3449:107a-13: bdag gis bsod nams rgya chen thob bsdus pa //
T02D3449:107a-14: gang des 'gro kun sdig las rnam rgyal zhing //
T02D3449:107a-15: bde ba'i mtha' gcig 'jam dbyangs mchog gyur cig /
T02D3449:107a-16: aa ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs slob dpon mi
